contentTypes.name: Styles: Borders
contentTypes.description: Effect Border Shape & Border Color, size is currently prescribed

contentTypes.name: Styles: Color
contentTypes.description: BG, Text, Fill, Stroke Colors across breakpoints.

contentTypes.name: Color Name
contentTypes.description: Tailwind Color system, entirely configurable.

contentTypes.name: Layout
contentTypes.description: Modern For Generic Container

contentTypes.name: Layout: Dimension Attribute
contentTypes.description:
Setup Layout proerties. Width, Min-Width, Max-Width, Height, Min-Height, Max-Height, Basis for any breakpoint.
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/width
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/min-width
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/max-width
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/height
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/min-height
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/max-height
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/basis

contentTypes.name: Layout: Display - Block Attribute
contentTypes.description: Display model for Block. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/display#block-and-inline

contentTypes.name: Layout: Display - Flex Attribute
contentTypes.description: Flow Model for Flex

contentTypes.name: Layout: Display - Grid Attribute
contentTypes.description: Flow Model for Grid

contentTypes.name: Layout: Display - Hidden (display: none)
contentTypes.description: Hide items from view per breakpoint

contentTypes.name: Layout: Item - Flex Attribute
contentTypes.description: Item Flex Attribute Overrides.

contentTypes.name: Layout: Item - Grid
contentTypes.description: Grid Item attributes relative to an item, overrides defaults of items inherited from parents.

contentTypes.name: Layout: Margin Attribute
contentTypes.description:
Setup Layout properties for element margin with all the tailwind default margin prefixes, break points, and static measurements. 
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/margin

contentTypes.name: Layout: Padding Attribute
contentTypes.description:
Setup Layout properties for element padding with all the tailwind default padding prefixes, break points, and static measurements. 
https://tailwindcss.com/docs/padding

contentTypes.name: Layout Position Attribute
contentTypes.description: Position controls where an element appears in relation to other elements, the window, or natural appearance in the page layout.

contentTypes.name: Layout: Position Orientation Attribute
contentTypes.description: Top/Right/Left/Bottom positioning used in Absolute, Fixed, and Static postioning. +/-{position}-{value}

contentTypes.name: Measurement: Break Points
contentTypes.description: Breakpoints for Responsive Design.

contentTypes.name: Measurements: Relative
contentTypes.description: Relative measurements are relative to Screen, Container, or Content. Full, n/12....

contentTypes.name: Measurements: Static
contentTypes.description: The standard Tailwind CSS values for fixed measurements. n(4px)

contentTypes.name: Styles: Box Shadow
contentTypes.description: Box Shadow Setting for containers

contentTypes.name: Styles: Overflow
contentTypes.description: Set Overflow properties of container

settings.helpText: Border Attributes: Short Descriptive Statement (e.g. Card Borders)
rounded = 4px, sm = 2px, md = 6px, lg = 8px, xl = 12px, 2xl = 16px, 3xl = 24px, full = circle
None, 1px, 2px, 4px, 8px
Select a border color option.
Color: {breakpoint|default} {colorFamily} {colorValue}
Apply color to background (bg), to text (text), to svg fill and stroke.
Modify opacity of background colors only.
Set of Color Names pertinent to this design system
Title should contain "Layout Setup" e.g. Layout Setup: Stand Alone Card. Many layouts should be reusable, consider this when naming them.
Setup Dimension settings for width, min-width, max-width, height, min-height, max-height, flex-basis for any breakpoint.
Tells an element how to behave in relationship to its siblings &/or children. Block, Flex, Grid (sort of)....
Set up Layout positioning, allows for responsive configurations.
Add internal padding to container.
Margin Settings: This should be used rarely to setup margins for an element.
Configure a background color per breakpoint
Set overflow for the container
This should be used for typography primarily.
Name of Dimension Setting. Dimension: [breakpoint:dimension-value]
Select Breakpoint Value
Select Type of Dimension (with, height, basis...)
Choose the actual measurement: Static Values are Pixel Values, Relative Values are generally %.
Display Block: {breakpoint} {block-type} {float}
Select the applicable breakpoint. No breakpoint is default and is also the basis of mobile layouts when combined with other breakpoints.

Display Block: Default is "block." Giveselement actual space in the flow. Float tells other content how to move around this object. e.g. text wrapping an image (inline), or multiple items lining up with eachother (block).
Horizontal Positioning of Item in parent. Allows for text to wrap around images, or items to stack next to each other. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/float
Title should include "Display Flex" e.g. Display Flex: Our Company - Hero
No break point is default, in the layout system the default also serves as the mobile breakpoint. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design
Flex Type: Flex is the default and most common, very occasionally inline flex is needed.
This sets the main axis of the flex container. X is row, Y is column. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex-direction
Wrap Behaviour for Flex Container. Default is no wrap. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex-wrap
Justify Content on axis. e.g. x-axis if flex-direction is row, y-axis if flex-direction is column. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/justify-content
Align Items on cross axis. e.g. y-axis if flex-direction is row, x-axis if flex-direction is column. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/align-items
Tells grouping of children how to fill main axis on wrap (x-row,  y-col). Defaults to Flex-Start. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/align-content
Space between elements in container. Currently only suports equal gaps for columns and rows. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/gap
Title should contain "Display Grid". e.g. Display Grid: Our Company - Hero
Grid Type: Grid is default and most common, inline-grid is pretty specialized.
Set Number of COlumns in Grid. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid-template-columns
Define the space between items in the grid.
Hidden, no breakpoint is default, otherwse set a breakpoint.
Select breakpoint: The default is equivalent to mobile, if more than on breakpoint is used.
Item Flex: breakpoint: [values]
Align Item in Flex Container cross axis (y if row(x), and x if column(y) ). https://tailwindcss.com/docs/align-self
Align Item in Flex Container on the axis. (with Row, or Column). https://tailwindcss.com/docs/justify-self
Allow Item in Flex Container to Stretch along the Flex Axis (row(default) or column). Default behaviour is to not Grow. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex-grow
Allow Item in Flex Container to Shrink along the Flex Axis (row(default) or column). Default behaviour is to not Shrink. https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex-shrink
Title should contain "Grid Item Attributes" e.g. Grid Item Attributes: Card - 4 Reasons to Absorb
Vertical alignment in grid space, "stretch" is default.
Horizontal Alignment in Grid Space. Stretch is default.
Name of Padding Setting. Padding: [breakpoint:dimension-value]
Select Breakpoint Value
Margin Prefixes from tailwind m (all around margin), mt (Margin Top), mr (Margin Right), mb (Margin Bottom), ml (Margin Left), mx (ml & mr), my(mt & mb)
Choose the actual measurement: Static Values are Pixel Values, Relative Values are generally %.
Set margin to Negative Value (Positive Default)
Name of Padding Setting. Padding: [breakpoint:dimension-value]
Select Breakpoint Value
Choose where the padding should go pt (Padding Top), pr (Padding Right), pb (Padding Bottom), pl (Padding Left), px (pl and pr), py (pt and pb)
Choose the actual measurement: Static Values are Pixel Values, Relative Values are generally %.
Name of position setting. Position: [breakpoint:position-value] [related values]

Relative: children are positioned relative to the element, which stays in the natural flow. Absolute breaks the flow and is relative to the nearest relative parent. Absolute, Fixed, and Sticky allow precise positioning.
Define Top, Right, Left, &/ Bottom positioning. Only works with Absolute, Fixed, and Sticky positions.
Layering of element default is 0
Stack is positive (defauilt) of Negative.
Location (top/right/bottom/left) and Value (relative/static)
Top, Right, Bottom, Left
Static (px based), Relative (usually % based)
Values for position location can be positive (+) or negative (-). Teh defauly is Positive.
Size of element relates to size of the screen, the containing element, or content. 6/12 = 50, full = 100%, fit is relative content.
Fixed pixel value: n(4px), px 1px. Use ab-content-size sparingly for Width Only on outer containers.
Shadow settings. Shadow does not affect component geometry. shadow-0002px-07 is like a soft border.
There should only be one of these per bg color. If you need a color search for existing content first.
Overflow X value
Overflow Y value
